content: this legal case took place in the municipal court split and involves the dissolution of a coownership property specifically an apartment the property will be sold at a public auction and the resulting value will be divided among the parties involved the claimant is entitled to 14 of the value while respondent 1 is also entitled to 14 and respondent 2 is entitled to 24 the claimant proposed the dissolution of the property but the respondent opposed claiming sole ownership of a portion of the property the court reviewed documents and expert testimony and concluded that a civil division through a public auction was necessary the court made its decision based on the property act
